label: clinical_signal_03_ep_030
content:

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: AE-0127, Description: upper respiratory infection, Grade: 1, Relatedness: not related, Resolved: true, Subject Group: statin

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PD-062, Description: IP temperature excursion during shipment, 2h out of range, Severity: moderate, Site: site_06
- PD ID: PD-063, Description: Dose modification without documented PI approval, Severity: moderate, Site: site_03

### Investigator Notes
- Enrollment on track per protocol timeline
- All CRFs current through prior visit cycle
- Post-amendment statin subgroup n=8 (subjects who could not discontinue); hepatic monitoring frequency doubled

### Events
- Drug accountability audit at Site 05: no discrepancies
- Investigator meeting minutes distributed
- End-of-phase safety data compilation initiated for regulatory briefing

### Notes
- Week 30: Amended protocol in effect at majority of sites. Hepatic monitoring frequency adjusted.
